resources.string: Keeping your body always in good health not an easy task. HealthAssistant helps you with monitoring and makes it easy for you to keep track of your health!
Welcome to your virtual health checkup!

Please keep the tip of you index finger on top of your camera lens which is at he back of your phone.\nPlease do not press too hard you will cut off circulation which will result in an inaccurate reading.\nIt will take a few seconds to compute your initial heart rate.
